name: C.A.T. (purplixgames)
description:
A  cozy Twine game where you go through the motions of life taking care of your cat, that is all. We promise. Definitely.

As this is an HTML/Twine game we do not recommend using the itch.io app, instead use the browser.

The first game by Purplix Studios: https://sparks51sp.wixsite.com/blog
